title: But I am not able to click on the star button
comment: K reply please
Amazing app! Really enjoyed playing this game.. Snappy salute!

title: Export Issues.
comment: It's the greatest app for chess lovers.I love it so much. How can I extract my favourit games from downloaded TWIC files to a separate pgm file?? And,please give sufficient instructions for "export filtered games" feature.Thanks in Advance :)
Mark the games you want to export as favorites (tap on the star). Then search for favorites. Then export filtered games to PGN.

title: Very good app.
comment: Only it should use strike for best moves in analyze mode like droidfish. And board search should have option to search only one side(white or black) piece positions. If possible it should show players clock times for pgn files with move times.( FICS ICC FIDELIVE pgn) And should show move times chart. Wish you all best!!!

title: Scid
comment: Why no tree window? The most important feature is not available. Mediocre.

title: Very nice....
comment: Forever best

title: Great Potential but lack important fearure
comment: Can't paste pgn from cliboard?
Long tap on the board for the board menu. There you'll see the menu option to paste from the clipboard.
So handy and easy to use reference for opening preparation!

title: My player's names is not working
comment: In scid the board switches automatically. Here nothing happens.

title: Loved it!
comment: I have downloaded several issues from twic downloads. Is there a way I can integrate them into one? I'm tired of opening them one by one. Plz help. Love this app so much.
There's no easy way from within the app. Untested: you could export the data to PGNs, join them (e.g. easy file split and join) and import the joined PGN file back into Scid.
Great Chess App

title: Hopeless.
comment: Why would anyone go through the trouble of developing and app and provide zero instructions on how to use it? Sometimes I am befuddled by human nature.

:-) If you are new to chess database applications then get to know Scid vs. PC (PC application): http://scidvspc.sourceforge.net/ There is extensive documentation available for Scid vs. PC online. Then after some experience with the PC application the app will make sense.
Great apps
Install won't move past 92%, even after cancel and restart
That's a problem of Google Play and / or your device (out of memory?), not of the app itself.

title: Please Reply
comment: Im having problems importing an engine. I wish to get both the critter and stockfish engines but Im having difficulty finding the directory or downloading it online. Please help.

Stockfish is here: https://stockfish.s3.amazonaws.com/stockfish-6-android.zip
Critter is here: http://www.vlasak.biz/critter/counta.php
After download you need to extract (unzip) the file and put the binary into the scid directory. Then import into scid. Drop me an email if you need further help.

title: Love it, but need guidance.
comment: I really love this app. But have a problem plz solve it. I m bound to import database only from twic, chessok anspd pgn file. Which only provide the latest games. How can I import old classic games of legends like, Morghy, Tall, Lasker, Fisher etc. I have downloaded the games of these players but can't open and watch their games on scid. Plz help.
Download zip files from here: http://www.pgnmentor.com/files.html , unzip them. Then copy the pgn files into the scid dir. Then choose to import a PGN file from the file menu.

title: Ruined a good app after update
comment: Used to be my favourite chess app,after latest update will not run analysis mode
Try to uninstall and reinstall the app. If this doesn't help just contact me via e-mail.

title: Great to look at games
comment: Wish it would have  better game list navigation. Haven't explored if there are options to restrict from the game list - couldn't find the control (rating or structure). Could restrict the games. However the one thing on my wishlist is the ability to remember previous filter (at-least last used one) as it saves having to enter it repeatedly (for my use case).
Thanks for your review! The search feature from the main menu filters the game list, so you will only see the games you're interested in.

title: Just ....bloody good.  Better even!
comment: A core classic must have app for chess nuts, if you could pick only two android chess apps this would be one, maybe DROIDFISH would be the other or Chess for Android, or maybe the "CVNCS" Chess app with it's twenty thousand (or 34,000 or whatever it is) puzzles for free, but if you had to pick just ONE, it must be this one, you could put a huge db file of puzzles, mate in 1 or 2 or 3, or tactics and use the Study mode to see if you can guess them. Install Stockfish to analyse..brilliant.

title: Slide pieces?
comment: I'm sure it's possible; how does one slide pieces?
You need to tap the source square and the target square. Sliding of the pieces is not implemented.

title: Great App
comment: I have a dozen chess APS and this is the best for game analysis and loading/editing PGN files. Definitely recommend.

title: Brilliant app, works like a charm
comment: Use it almost daily and really enjoy it.  I have one minor request: could we add the feature to use the volume keys as forward/backward buttons while reading a game? That would make reading with one hand while standing in public transport so much more comfortable.  Thank you so much for this great app!
J

very good!

title: Great for getting pgn
comment: A great app. You can download the newest pgn from twic and stay up to date with opening theory. This along with droidfish is a great pair. Simply amazing that its all free!

title: I love it
comment: A very good GUI for viewing the pgn files, also latest games can be downloaded from two sites. I used to use scid, later changed to scid vs pc, as my chess gui for windows. And so its convinient for me to have scid on the go on my android device. I have no complaints regarding it. However, I wish for one thing in it. That is able to annotate with comments and and colors to squares ( to highlight them) and arrows, like we do in scid or scid vs pc. Will be very grateful if it is upgraded to have those features. Thank you once again for this lovely application.  ADDITIONAL REQUEST: will be great if we can play on fics with this app. thank you.

title: Coordinates + notation bugs
comment: Coordinates inside/by the board would be highly appreciated. When you are flipping the board back and forth coordinates are essential. Thanks.  UPDATE: There are some minor bugs in the notation, especially in the variants: the moves do not have the signs + nor # when it is check or mate.

title: Incredible

It handles my million plus game database easily, and supports analysis, variations, search, etc. It's awesome.
Excellent at reviewing and storing games. Wouldn't be with out it
